title.rendered: “NEWCARE – SPRING TRIP” BRINGS MORE SUNSHINE FOR WORKERS ON TET HOLIDAY

content.rendered:
(The South – January 20th, 2020) Annual activity “Spring Trip” organized by Newtecons Investment Construction Joint Stock Company officially departed and brought nearly 100 workers to their hometowns to celebrate Tet Holiday from South to North.  

This is one of the practical social action programs in NewCare chain of Newtecons to spread positive values. Over the years, this activity has attracted many resources from Departments and Site Steering Committees to share love and affection for a happy Lunar New Year.

Newtecons and Newcare Organization Board wish all workers a happy and prosperous Lunar New Year – a warm and cozy Tet Holiday with your family. Please rest and enjoy this meaningful time to come back together with us.

Some images at the program:
